name: Name
test_mode_warning_2: Setting this to False will use REAL funds, use at your own risk.
pair_with_note: Select your base currency to use for trading (trade for example USDT pairs)
quantity_note:
Total amount per trade (your base currency balance must be at least MAX_COINS * QUANTITY)
Binance uses a minimum of 10 USDT per trade, add a bit extra to enable selling if the price drops.
Recommended: no less than 12 USDT. Suggested: 15 or more.
max_coin_note: Maximum number of trade 'slots' at any time (your USDT balance must be at least MAX_COINS * QUANTITY)
time_difference_note: The amount of time in MINUTES to calculate the difference from the current price (minimum: 1).
time_frame_note: The interval time each sample is captured.
sample_note: The number of samples are evaluated.
recheck_interval_note:
Number of times to check for TP/SL during each TIME_DIFFERENCE (minimum: 1).
Don't spam the Binance API, you will be banned (max 1200 requests per minute per IP).
change_in_price_note: The difference in % between the first and second checks for the price.
stop_loss_note: Define in % when to sell a coin that's not making a profit.
take_profit_note: Define in % when to take profit on a profitable coin.

Investment amount must greater than or e: Investment amount must greater than or equal to base order amount
strategy_tooltip: Choose between “Long” to profit from rising prices or “Short” to profit from falling prices in the market.
leverage_type_tooltip: Select “Cross” for shared margin across all positions or “Isolate” for individual margin per position.
leverage_val_tooltip: Set the leverage level (e.g., 2x, 5x) to amplify your trading power. Be cautious, as higher leverage increases risk.
rank_tooltip: Indicates the current ranking or position of an asset compared to others. A lower rank may suggest a stronger asset.
rsi_tooltip: Measures the speed and change of price movements. RSI values above 70 may indicate overbought conditions, while values below 30 may suggest oversold conditions.
safety_tooltip: Indicates the level of safety or risk associated with an asset. Higher safety ratings may imply lower risk.
technicalscore_tooltip: A composite score that combines multiple technical indicators to assess an asset's overall health or potential.
trend_tooltip: Identifies the direction in which an asset's price is moving, such as uptrend (rising prices), downtrend (falling prices), or sideways (range-bound) movement.
changed_tooltip: Displays the percentage change in an asset's price over a specified period.
atr_tooltip: Measures market volatility by calculating the average range between an asset's high and low prices over a specified period.
ema_tooltip: A weighted moving average that gives more importance to recent prices, responding more quickly to price changes.
ma_tooltip: Shows the average price of an asset over a specified period, smoothing out price fluctuations and highlighting trends.
resend_email_des: To access your account, please activate it by clicking the link in the activation email sent to your inbox.
resend_email_tip: Tip: Check Your Spam or Junk Folder: Sometimes, activation emails end up in spam or junk folders. Please check there
invitedUsers: Invite your friends and earn up to 30% commission from their every purchase. For more details, please check <tos>our referral rules</tos>
important_note_desc:
To ensure secure and uninterrupted trading, it is mandatory to add our platform’s IP addresses to your exchange’s whitelist. 
 Please copy these IP addresses from the text box below and promptly add them.
